## Graduate Courses

**Physics & Medical Imaging**: <br/> Neuroimaging Data Acquisition with MRI (NIIN530); <br/> Fundamentals of Human Neuroimaging (NIIN 510); <br/> Experimental Design for Neuroimaging (NIIN 520); <br/>

**Data Science & Machine Learning**: <br/> Neuroimaging Data Processing Methods (NIIN 540); <br/> Computational Modeling in Neuroimaging (NIIN 550); <br/> Data Science in Neuroimaging (NIIN 580);

**Neuroscience & Research**: <br/> Neuroimaging and Systems Neuroscience (NIIN 500); <br/> Neuroimaging Genetics (NIIN 570); <br/> Current Topics in Neuroimaging Informatics (NIIN 597); <br/> Science Communications (NIIN 600);
